Package com.composum.pages.components.model.time

Class DateRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.components.model.time.DateRange
  • public class DateRange
extends Object
    a range of dates (days) - 'from' day (included) to 'to' day (excluded; the next day) with a range type - one of { 'year', 'month', 'week', 'day' } - to support spinning

    • Constructor Detail

      • DateRange

        public DateRange​(int type,
                 int year,
                 int... value)
        constructs a range of a given range type (year, month, week, single day of month)
        Parameters:
        type - one of { Calendar.YEAR, Calendar.MONTH, Calendar.WEEK_OF_YEAR, Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH }
        year - the year must always be specified
        value - depends on th type; the month (1..!) / week number, the day of month or the amount of type

      • DateRange

        public DateRange​(@Nullable
                 TimeZone timeZone,
                 @Nullable
                 Locale locale,
                 int type,
                 int year,
                 int... value)
        constructs a range of a given range type with specified time zone and locale

      • DateRange

        public DateRange​(@Nullable
                 Date from,
                 @Nullable
                 Date to)
        constructs a range without type
        Parameters:
        from - the start date of the date range
        to - the first day after the date range

      • DateRange

        public DateRange​(@Nullable
                 TimeZone timeZone,
                 @Nullable
                 Locale locale,
                 @Nullable
                 Date from,
                 @Nullable
                 Date to)
        constructs a range without type with specified time zone and locale

      • DateRange

        public DateRange​(@Nullable
                 Calendar from,
                 @Nullable
                 Calendar to)
        constructs a range without type
        Parameters:
        from - the start date of the date range; if 'null' a current month range is built
        to - the first day after the date range; if 'null' a single day range is built

      • DateRange

      • getRule

        public String getRule()
        builds am URL parameter friendly range definition rule string of the date range
        Returns:
        a typed rule ('type|year[|value[|...]]') or a day range ('yyyy-MM-dd[_yyyy-MM-dd]')
